attributes.action: Mrs May ,, Immediately Sack Sadiq Khan (The Mayor Of London)
attributes.additional_details: Since Sadiq Khan Was Elected ,, London Has Become A Far Less Safe City To Live Work And Tourism Is Suffering Badly , Which Earns London Businesses Desperate Revenue. People Are Scared To Visit London.
attributes.background: The Mayor Of London Stated Recently After Terrorist Attacks Around London ,, Terrorist Attacks Are Part And Parcel Of Living In A Big City , This Statement Brings The London Mayorship Into Disrepute.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments. 

In any case, the London Mayor is not appointed by the UK Government or Parliament.
